newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa money mkt shortage dips below 10 bln rand.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa money mkt shortage dips below 10 bln rand.

text.p: South Africa's money market shortage dipped below the 10 billion rand level on Wednesday, falling to 9.850 billion rand from 10.295 billion rand on Tuesday, the Reserve Bank said.
